colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @009A *, ,(ZHES NAG PHYOGS PA'I 'KHON GNOD ZHI BAR BYED PA'I THABS PHAN BDE'I DPAL 'BAR ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, SNYIGS MA'I DUS 'DIR NAG PHYOGS @009B KYI GNOD PA BYUNG NAS ZHI DRAG GI THABS GANG GIS KYANG GDUGS NA PON PO NGAG GIS MTSUN LHA RNAMS KYI RTEN BZHENGS PA DANG TSE THAR GTONG BA SOGS KYIS 'PHRAL DU RE ZHAG PHAN PA 'DRA PA NA YOD KYANG, MTHU STOBS CAN GYI BON PO DNGOS GNAS PA DGON PA DANG, BON PO'I MING BTOGS PA MANG PO YOD KYANG LANG MO TZAM 'DRA YID CHOS DKA' BA'I PHYIR, DKON MCHOG GI BKA' DANG BDEN STOBS KYIS MA GRUB PA CI YANG MED DO SNYAM NAS BDAG 'DI'I 'DON CHA TZAM BSGRIGS NAS BYAS PA LA PHAN PA MYONG BA MTHONG BA LA, PHYIS MDO SNGAGS KYI CHOS LA RNAM DPYOD MCHOG TU YANGS PA'I MKHAN PO CHOS RJE BLO BZANG DKON MCHOG GRAGS PAS 'DI LA BSHAMS TSUL DANG MDZAD BYANG SOGS GSAL BA ZHIG DGOS ZHES PA'I GSUNG GIS BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS, LHA BA NAG PO'I...)
